name: Darkest Lariat
description: You dangerously swing both arms at a creature in range, ignoring any positive stat changes the target is affected with.Â  Make a melee attack, dealing 2d6 + MOVE dark damage on a hit.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
